Medicare Endpoint

Source: R/S7_care.R
careMain.Rd

Medicare Endpoint

Usage

careMain(alias)

Arguments

alias

<chr> endpoint alias

Value

An S7 <careMain> object.

Examples

careMain("contact")
#> <careMain>
#>  @ title     : chr "Public Reporting of Missing Digital Contact Information"
#>  @ metadata  : <careMeta>
#>  .. @ description: chr "In the May 2020 CMS Interoperability and Patient Access final rule, CMS finalized the policy to publicly report"| __truncated__
#>  .. @ temporal   : chr "2023-01-01 • 2024-09-30"

#>  .. @ references : chr "https://data.cms.gov/sites/default/files/2021-12/8eb2b4bf-6e5f-4e05-bcdb-39c07ad8f77a/Missing_Digital_Contact_I"| __truncated__
#>  .. @ download   : chr "https://data.cms.gov/sites/default/files/2024-10/fb284594-a4ff-442f-8b66-f6838c4355ce/Providers%20without%20End"| __truncated__
